name: Accordion (Collapsible Sections)
description: Accordion/collapsible sections for FAQ, product details, or any expandable content. Mobile-friendly with smooth animations.
content:
<script>
(function() {
  var container = document.querySelector('{{SELECTOR}}');
  if (!container) return;
  
  var items = [
    { title: '{{ITEM_1_TITLE}}', content: '{{ITEM_1_CONTENT}}' },
    { title: '{{ITEM_2_TITLE}}', content: '{{ITEM_2_CONTENT}}' },
    { title: '{{ITEM_3_TITLE}}', content: '{{ITEM_3_CONTENT}}' },
    { title: '{{ITEM_4_TITLE}}', content: '{{ITEM_4_CONTENT}}' }
  ];
  
  // Remove empty items
  items = items.filter(function(item) { return item.title !== ''; });
  
  var allowMultiple = {{ALLOW_MULTIPLE}};
  var openFirst = {{OPEN_FIRST}};
  
  // Inject CSS
  var style = document.createElement('style');
  style.textContent = '' +
    '.at-accordion { width: 100%; }' +
    '.at-accordion-item { border: 1px solid #dee2e6; margin-bottom: 10px; border-radius: 4px; overflow: hidden; }' +
    '.at-accordion-header { background: {{HEADER_BG}}; padding: 15px 20px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; transition: background 0.3s ease; user-select: none; }' +
    '.at-accordion-header:hover { background: {{HEADER_HOVER_BG}}; }' +
    '.at-accordion-header.active { background: {{HEADER_ACTIVE_BG}}; color: {{HEADER_ACTIVE_COLOR}}; }' +
    '.at-accordion-title { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 0; }' +
    '.at-accordion-icon { font-size: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s ease; }' +
    '.at-accordion-header.active .at-accordion-icon { transform: rotate(180deg); }' +
    '.at-accordion-content { max-height: 0; overflow: hidden; transition: max-height 0.3s ease, padding 0.3s ease; background: white; }' +
    '.at-accordion-content.active { max-height: 1000px; padding: 20px; }' +
    '.at-accordion-body { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; color: #495057; }' +
    '@media (max-width: 768px) {' +
    '  .at-accordion-header { padding: 12px 15px; }' +
    '  .at-accordion-title { font-size: 14px; }' +
    '  .at-accordion-content.active { padding: 15px; }' +
    '}';
  document.head.appendChild(style);
  
  // Build accordion HTML
  container.className = 'at-accordion';
  container.innerHTML = '';
  
  for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
    var item = items[i];
    var isOpen = openFirst && i === 0;
    
    var accordionItem = document.createElement('div');
    accordionItem.className = 'at-accordion-item';
    
    var header = document.createElement('div');
    header.className = 'at-accordion-header' + (isOpen ? ' active' : '');
    header.setAttribute('role', 'button');
    header.setAttribute('aria-expanded', isOpen ? 'true' : 'false');
    
    var title = document.createElement('h3');
    title.className = 'at-accordion-title';
    title.textContent = item.title;
    
    var icon = document.createElement('span');
    icon.className = 'at-accordion-icon';
    icon.innerHTML = '▼';
    
    header.appendChild(title);
    header.appendChild(icon);
    
    var content = document.createElement('div');
    content.className = 'at-accordion-content' + (isOpen ? ' active' : '');
    
    var body = document.createElement('div');
    body.className = 'at-accordion-body';
    body.innerHTML = item.content;
    
    content.appendChild(body);
    
    accordionItem.appendChild(header);
    accordionItem.appendChild(content);
    container.appendChild(accordionItem);
  }
  
  // Add click handlers
  var headers = container.querySelectorAll('.at-accordion-header');
  for (var j = 0; j < headers.length; j++) {
    headers[j].addEventListener('click', function() {
      var isActive = this.classList.contains('active');
      var content = this.nextElementSibling;
      
      // If not allowing multiple, close all others
      if (!allowMultiple) {
        var allHeaders = container.querySelectorAll('.at-accordion-header');
        var allContents = container.querySelectorAll('.at-accordion-content');
        for (var k = 0; k < allHeaders.length; k++) {
          allHeaders[k].classList.remove('active');
          allHeaders[k].setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
          allContents[k].classList.remove('active');
        }
      }
      
      // Toggle this item
      if (isActive && allowMultiple) {
        this.classList.remove('active');
        this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        content.classList.remove('active');
      } else {
        this.classList.add('active');
        this.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'true');
        content.classList.add('active');
      }
    });
  }
})();
</script>

variables.name: {{ITEM_1_CONTENT}}
variables.example: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products.

variables.name: {{ITEM_2_CONTENT}}
variables.example: Most orders ship within 24 hours and arrive in 3-5 business days.

variables.name: {{ITEM_3_CONTENT}}
variables.example: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide.

variables.name: {{ITEM_4_TITLE}}
variables.example: How can I track my order?

variables.name: {{ITEM_4_CONTENT}}
variables.example: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.

variables.name: {{ALLOW_MULTIPLE}}
variables.description: Allow multiple items open at once (true/false)

notes: Supports 2-4 accordion items. For more items, duplicate the ITEM_X variables pattern.
